alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:51PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Millard and northwestern Beaver Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 551 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 33 miles southeast of Garrison, or 33 miles northwest of Milford, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kings Canyon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 14 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
